instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data: Scrape off all loose, scaling, flaking, and peeling paint manually or by using BOYSEN®® Paint and Varnish Remover B‑141, as necessary. Wash surfaces clean and completely remove chemical residue. Let it dry. In case of mildew infestation, treat with a bleach solution (1:3, laundry bleach to water, respetively) by swabbing or brushing. To ensure proper treatment, let stand for 24 hours before cleaning off residue. Let dry. Surface to be repainted should be clean and dry, free from dust and dirt, and all possible contaminants.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Water-based System Primer (for resulting bare substrate): BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Flat Latex B‑701 Putty: BOYSEN®® Masonry Putty B‑7311 Topcoat (2 coats): BOYSEN®® BUG OFF™ Enamel-based System Primer (for resulting bare substrate): BOYSEN®® Flatwall Enamel B‑800 Putty: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Glazing Putty B‑311 Topcoat (2 coats): BOYSEN®® BUG OFF™

calculator.title: Putty (Spot)
calculator.item: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Glazing Putty B‑311
